match.schema:
$ref: "#/definitions/RestaurantsDisplaySettings"

definitions:
    RestaurantsBubbleView:
        type: object
        description: Настройки отображения bubbles_list ресторанов
        additionalProperties: false
        properties:
            bg_color:
                type: string
            text_color:
                type: string
            title_font_size:
                type: integer
                minimum: 1
            subtitle_font_size:
                type: integer
                minimum: 1
            overlay:
                type: object
                additionalProperties: false
                properties:
                    font_size:
                        type: integer
        required:
          - overlay
          
    Anchor:
        type: array
        items:
            type: number
        minItems: 2
        maxItems: 2

    RestaurantsClusterView:
        type: object
        description: Настройки отображения кластера ресторанов
        additionalProperties: false
        properties:
            image_tag:
                type: string
            selected_image_tag:
                type: string
            overlay:
                type: object
                additionalProperties: false
                properties:
                    font_size:
                        type: integer
                    anchor:
                        $ref: "#/definitions/Anchor"
                required:
                  - anchor
        required:
          - image_tag
          - selected_image_tag
          - overlay

    RestaurantsMessages:
        type: object
        additionalProperties: false
        properties:
            no_objects:
                type: string
            increase_zoom:
                type: string
        required:
            - no_objects
            - increase_zoom

    RestaurantsDisplaySettings:
        type: object
        description: Настройки для ресторанов Еды
        additionalProperties: false
        properties:
            bubble:
                $ref: "#/definitions/RestaurantsBubbleView"
            cluster:
                $ref: "#/definitions/RestaurantsClusterView"
            messages:
                $ref: "#/definitions/RestaurantsMessages"
        required:
          - messages
          - cluster
